sentences.en: An all - region DVD player such as Apex is strongly recommended.
sentences.cn: 大多数dvd产品的区域编码是6.我们建议您使用全区播放器来放映我们的产品.不存在区域编码问题.

sentences.en: APEX tickets are usually not open.
sentences.cn: 预售优惠票预定的搭乘日期通常不能更改.

sentences.en: Fig .4 Yellow apex stage, showing the normal and abnormal structure of mitochondria.
sentences.cn: 图4黄梢期, 示完整的线粒体和部分降解的线粒体.

sentences.en: Follicle dehiscent; mature carpels tappering to the base , apex papillate.
sentences.cn: 果开裂, 成熟心皮向基部变狭, 上部多疣.

sentences.en: From the apex of perfection hangs the loving Jesus crowned.
sentences.cn: 完美之顶加冕的救主耶稣高高悬起.

sentences.en: He reached the apex of power in the early 1930 s.
sentences.cn: 他在三十年代初达到了权力的顶峰.

sentences.en: He was at the apex of his fortunes.
His election to the presidency was the apex of his career.
sentences.cn: 当选总统是他一生事业的顶峰.

sentences.en: Ring's diameter increases as we move away from the apex of the cone.
sentences.cn: 诸圆环的直径自圆锥顶逐渐增大.

sentences.en: Steven : You'll find Mr. Brian Taylor is a force to be reckoned with at Apex Trading.
sentences.cn: 您会发现BrianTaylor先生是Apex贸易公司的大将.
优惠往返机票价格为195英镑。

sentences.en: The apex of the flames licked the crimson sky.
sentences.cn: 火焰的舌尖舔卷着绯红色的天空。

sentences.en: The cable stays converge to a single point on the apex of the tower.
sentences.cn: 纲索在塔架顶部集中在一点.

sentences.en: These channels are most common near the apex of the alluvial fan body.
sentences.cn: 这些河道最常见于近冲积扇体的顶端.

sentences.en: You have reached the apex of earthly honour.
sentences.cn: 你已经达到世界上荣誉的顶点.

trans.tran_cn: 顶，<喻>顶峰，<美><矿>脉尖，尖端
trans.tran_en: the top or highest part of something pointed or curved
